languages.text: "Может, ты и прав, Висирь. Пускай ткачи продолжают кровавую службу".
"Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."
languages.original_text: "Может, ты и прав, Висирь. Пускай ткачи продолжают кровавую службу".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The weavers may carry on with their bloody service."
"Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The weavers may carry on with their bloody service."
"Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The weavers may carry on with their bloody service."
"Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The weavers may carry on with their bloody service."
"Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."
"Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."

languages.text: «Tal vez tenga razón, Visir. Los tejedores pueden continuar con su servicio sangriento».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez tenga razón, Visir. Los tejedores pueden continuar con su servicio sangriento».

languages.text: 「お前が正かもな、ヴィジール。紡績工たちは血なまぐさい仕事を続けるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が正かもな、ヴィジール。ウィーヴァーたちは血なまぐさい仕事を続けるかもしれない」

languages.text: “或许你说得没错，宿老。我允许织网者继续举行他们的鲜血仪式。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."

traits.locale_text: “或许你说得没错，宿老。我允许织网者继续举行他们的鲜血仪式。”

languages.text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr recht, Wesir. Die Spinner können ihren blutigen Dienst fortsetzen."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr recht, Wesir. Die Spinner können ihren blutigen Dienst fortsetzen."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez peut-être pas tort, vizir. C'est d'accord, les tisseurs sont libres de poursuivre leurs rituels sanglants. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez peut-être pas tort, vizir. C'est d'accord, les tisseurs sont libres de poursuivre leurs rituels sanglants. »

languages.text: "Belki de haklısındır Vezir. Dokurlar kanlı hizmetlerini sürdürebilir."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you are right, Vizsier. The spinners may carry on with their bloody service."
